results.title: Refrigeration mechanic
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Explores the wide ramifications of refrigeration including the vast plants which air condition modern skyscrapers, large cold stores, and refrigerated cargo ships. In addition to mechanical ability and welding skill, the need for a clear technical grasp of the refrigeration process is made plain.

results.title: Radio and television technician
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Work of the skilled radio and television technician includes the manufacture of radio and television receivers, the operation and maintenance of broadcasting equipment and telecommunications services. This is a field which is constantly expanding, and those who gain additional qualifications can progress to computer engineering, radio frequency heating and satellite communications.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Work of the skilled radio and television technician includes the manufacture of radio and television receivers, the operation and maintenance of broadcasting equipment and telecommunications services. This is a field which is constantly expanding, and those who gain additional qualifications can progress to computer engineering, radio frequency heating and satellite communications.

results.title: The State public service
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Every career in the world of business and commerce is also present in the Public service and in some cases this field of employment offers better opportunities. A brief outline of the responsibilities undertaken by the Public Service lead to a glimpse of some of the careers which are involved. The various opportunities for training including University scholarships, are also included.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.

results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions

results.title: Pharmacy
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A vocational guidance film showing the pharmacist at work in the preparation of preventative and curative medicines. Discusses careers in the corner pharmacy, in a large pharmaceutical company or in a hospital.

results.title: Medical technology
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
The medical technologist aids the pathologist, the biochemist, the bacteriologist and other medical practitioners in diagnosing disease in patients. The technologist may specialize in one of these fields in a large hospital or in smaller hospitals his work may be general. Study and training differ from state to state but work is generally obtained in a hospital first, and part-time study at a technical college toward a certificate or diploma is then taken. Advanced work and training may then be taken later.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
The medical technologist aids the pathologist, the biochemist, the bacteriologist and other medical practitioners in diagnosing disease in patients. The technologist may specialize in one of these fields in a large hospital or in smaller hospitals his work may be general. Study and training differ from state to state but work is generally obtained in a hospital first, and part-time study at a technical college toward a certificate or diploma is then taken. Advanced work and training may then be taken later.

results.title: Mechanical engineering
results.creator_credit: Mutual Film Corporation and Career Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Shows the many activities of the mechanical engineer in designing and constructing machinery of every kind. The student needs to be good at mathematics and science. Shows him involved in the study of technical drawing, principles of air conditioning, of refrigeration, internal combustion, jet engines and how they perform under various conditions.
results.description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Shows the many activities of the mechanical engineer in designing and constructing machinery of every kind. The student needs to be good at mathematics and science. Shows him involved in the study of technical drawing, principles of air conditioning, of refrigeration, internal combustion, jet engines and how they perform under various conditions.

Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
Shows the many activities of the mechanical engineer in designing and constructing machinery of every kind. The student needs to be good at mathematics and science. Shows him involved in the study of technical drawing, principles of air conditioning, of refrigeration, internal combustion, jet engines and how they perform under various conditions.
